ManifestOrientation.summary: The orientation member defines the default orientation for all the website's top-level Browsing context.

blockquote.para: Note: orientation and/or its specific values might not be supported by a user agent on various display modes because supporting them does not make sense for the particular context.
Note: The orientation can be changed at runtime via the Screen Orientation API.
